==Story==
{{VO/Story
|character           = Eula
|language            = ko
|name                = 유라

|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 페보니우스 기사단의 유격대 대장, 「파도 기사」 유라・로렌스. 당신에게 인사드립니다…. 그래, 맞아, 로렌스. 보다시피 난 죄인의 후예, 기사단의 스파이야. 그들에게 복수를 하고 있지
|vo_01_01_rm         = Peboniuseu Gisadan-ui yugyeokdae daejang, "Pado Gisa" Yura Rorenseu. Dangsin'ege insadeurimnida.... Geurae, maja, Rorenseu. Bodasipi nan joein-ui huye, Gisadan-ui seupaiya. Geudeulege boksureul hago itji
|vo_01_01_tl         = Reconnaissance Company Captain of the Knights of Favonius, "Wave Knight" Eula Lawrence. Greetings to you... Yes, right, Lawrence. As you can see, I am a descendant of sinners, and a spy of the Knights. I am taking vengeance to them.

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・예절
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Etiquette
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Etiquette.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 기사와 귀족의 예절은 일맥상통해. 기사의 예절은 허례허식을 간소화했을 뿐이지
|vo_02_01_rm         = Gisawa gwijok-ui yejeoleun ilmaeksangtonghae. Gisa-ui yejeoleun heoryeheosig-eul gansohwahaesseul ppun'iji
|vo_02_01_tl         = A Knight and an aristocrat's etiquette are the same. An etiquette of a Knight has just simplified the empty formalities and vanity.

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・검술
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Bladework
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Bladework.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 페보니우스 검술? 나한테 배우고 싶어? 네가 다 익힌 다음 너한테 복수하는 것도 재밌겠네
|vo_02_02_rm         = Peboniuseu geomsul? Nahante baeugo sipeo? Nega da ikhin daeum neohante boksuhaneun geotdo jaemitgetne
|vo_02_02_tl         = Favonius swordsmanship? You want to learn from me? After you are finished mastering it, avenging to you can be amusing as well.

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・규칙
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Rules
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Rules.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 귀족들의 진부한 규칙…? 그냥 듣고 흘려. 난 몇백 개씩 외우도록 강요당했는데도 별로 신경 안 쓰거든
|vo_02_03_rm         = Gwijokdeul-ui jinbuhan gyuchik...? Geunyang deutgo heullyeo. Nan myeotbaek gaessik oeudorok gang'yodanghaetneundedo byeollo singyeong an sseugeodeun
|vo_02_03_tl         = Worn-out rules of aristocrats...? Just don't take much care of it. I was forced to memorize several hunderds of them, but I don't care much.

|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 빨리 우산 안으로 들어와, 다 젖겠어. 네가 병들면 난 누구한테 복수하라고?
|vo_03_01_rm         = Ppalli usan an'euro deuleowa, da jeotgesseo. Nega byeongdeulmyeon nan nuguhante boksuharago?
|vo_03_01_tl         = Come into the umbrella quick, you're going to get soaked wet. If you get sick, who am I supposed to avenge to?

|vo_03_02_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 진짜 성가신 날씨야. 천둥소리가 청각을 방해해서 주변 상황을 쉽게 감지할 수 없게 된다고
|vo_03_02_rm         = Jinjja seonggasin nalssiya. Cheondungsoriga cheonggak'eul banghaehaeseo jubyeon sanghwang'eul swipge gamjihal su eopge doendago
|vo_03_02_tl         = It's a really bothersome weather. The sound of thunder distracts my hearing, so it is not easy for me to sense the surrounding situation fast.

|vo_03_03_title      = 햇살이 좋을 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 시야가 딱 좋네! 높은 곳에 오르면 주변의 적들이 한눈에 다 보이지
|vo_03_03_rm         = Siyaga ttak jotne! Nopeun got'e oreumyeon jubyeon-ui jeokdeuli hannun'e da boiji
|vo_03_03_tl         = What a nice view! When you go up high, you can see the enemies nearby at a glance.

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 일어날 시간이야. 일출 두 시간 전은 밤새 보초 선 병사가 가장 피곤할 때니까 우리가 움직이기 딱 좋은 시간이라고!
|vo_04_01_rm         = Ileonal siganiya. Ilchul du sigan jeon'eun bamsae bocho seon byeongsaga gajang pigonhal ttaenikka uriga umjikigi ttak joeun siganirago!
|vo_04_01_tl         = Time to wake up. Two hours before sunrise is when soldiers who have been on duty all night are the most tired, so it's the best time for us to move!

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 점심엔 탄수화물 대신 고기를 많이 먹어야 식곤증이 안 와. 밥 먹고 졸다가 당할 수도 있다고
|vo_04_02_rm         = Jeomsim'en tansuhwamul daesin gogireul mani meogeoya sikgonjeung'i an wa. Bap meokgo joldaga danghal sudo itdago
|vo_04_02_tl         = At lunch, you should eat lots of meat than carbohydrate so that you won't feel drowsy after a meal. You can get attacked while dozing off after eating.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 「부드러운 바람이 당신의 밤을 평안하게 지켜주길」…. 옛 귀족의 인사말에 모처럼 이런 좋은 말이 있네
|vo_04_03_rm         = "Budeureoun baram'i dangsin-ui bameul pyeong'anhage jikyeojugil".... Yet gwijok-ui insamale mocheoreom ireon joeun mali itne
|vo_04_03_tl         = "May soft winds protect your night peacefully"... There are good words in old aristocrats' greetings, huh.

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 골피리 자장가 한번 들어볼래? 들으면 영영 깨어나지 못할 거야…. 하지만 이런 식으로 복수하는 건 너무 시시하잖아
|vo_04_04_rm         = Golpiri jajangga hanbeon deuleobollae? Deuleumyeon yeongyeong kkaeeonaji mothal geoya.... Hajiman ireon sigeuro boksuhaneun geon neomu sisihajana
|vo_04_04_tl         = Want to hear a bone pipe lullaby? You will never wake up again if you listen to it... But avenging like this is just so petty.

|vo_05_01_title      = 유라 자신에 대해・기사
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: The Knights
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - The Knights.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 적 내부에 침투하면 복수가 훨씬 수월해지잖아? 그래서 기사단에 가입했어
|vo_05_01_rm         = Jeok naebue chimtuhamyeon boksuga hwolssin suwolhaejijana? Geuraeseo Gisadan'e gaiphaesseo
|vo_05_01_tl         = If you infiltrate inside the enemies, vengeance gets much easier, right? That's why I joined the Knights.

|vo_05_02_title      = 유라 자신에 대해・태도
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Bearing
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Bearing.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 페보니우스 기사가 된 이상 기본적인 업무엔 최선을 다해야지. 아니면 그저 그런 사람들과 다를 게 뭐야. 아무리 죄인이어도 그렇게 살면 안 되지
|vo_05_02_rm         = Peboniuseu Gisaga doen isang gibonjeogin eopmuen choeseon'eul dahaeyaji. Animyeon geujeo geureon saramdeulgwa dareul ge mwoya. Amuri joein'ieodo geureoke salmyeon an doeji
|vo_05_02_tl         = As long as I'm a Favonius Knight, I have to work my best on basic tasks. Or else, what am I different with indifferent people. Even though I am a sinner, I shouldn't live like that.

|vo_05_03_title      = 유라 자신에 대해・유격
|vo_05_03_subtitle   = About {character}: Scout
|vo_05_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Scout.ogg
|vo_05_03_tx         = 자유롭게 적군을 사냥하거나 전장의 측면에서 적을 제압하는 게 바로 유격 기사가 할 일이야. 규율이 별로 없어서 완전 내 스타일이지
|vo_05_03_rm         = Jayuropge jeokgun'eul sanyanghageona jeonjang-ui cheukmyeon'eseo jeogeul jeaphaneun ge baro yugyeok gisaga hal il'iya. Gyuyul'i byeollo eopsseoseo wanjeon nae seutail'iji
|vo_05_03_tl         = Freely hunting enemies or arresting enemies at the side of the battlefield is what a Reconnaissance Knight should do. There are not many rules, which is just my style.

|vo_05_04_title      = 유라 자신에 대해・춤
|vo_05_04_subtitle   = About {character}: Dance
|vo_05_04_friendship = 4
|vo_05_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Dance.ogg
|vo_05_04_tx         = 로렌스 가문의 전통도 다 쓸모없는 건 아니야. 순결하고 고아한 「제례의 춤」은 내 마음에 평온과 위안을 가져다줘. 몇 년이 지났는데도 나한테 아주 소중해. 몸이 모든 스텝을 기억하지…. 그러니까 나만의 「페보니우스 검술」을 배우고 싶다면 일단 이 춤부터 배워야 할 거야
|vo_05_04_rm         = Rorenseu Gamun-ui jeontongdo da sseulmoeopneun geon aniya. Sungyeolhago goahan "Jerye-ui Chum"eun nae maeum'e pyeong'ongwa wianeul gajyeodajwo. Myeot nyeon'i jinatneundedo nahante aju sojunghae. Momi modeun seutebeul gieokhaji.... Geureonikka naman'ui "Peboniuseu Geomsul"eul baeugo sipdamyeon ildan i chumbuteo baewoya hal geoya
|vo_05_04_tl         = Not all traditions of the Lawrence Clan are useless. The pure and classical "Dance of Ritual" brings peace and comfort to my mind. Even though a few years have passed, it is still very dear to my. My body remembers each and every step... So if you want to learn my "Favonius Swordsmanship", you should learn this dance first.

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・공통점
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Commonality
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Commonality.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 사실 우리 둘은 꽤 비슷한 것 같아. 몬드에서 우린 둘 다 「외부인」이잖아. 다만 넌 모두의 사랑을 받지만, 난 항상 견제를 받는 경계대상이지
|vo_06_01_rm         = Sasil uri dureun kkwae biseuthan geot gata. Mondeueseo urin dul da "oebuin"ijana. Daman neon modu-ui sarang'eul batjiman, nan hangsang gyeonjereul batneun gyeonggyedaesang'iji
|vo_06_01_tl         = I actually think we are quite similar within each other. In Mondstadt, we are both "Outsiders". However, you receive everyone's love, but I'm always a cause of alarm that gets hold in check.

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・복수
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Feud
|vo_06_02_friendship    = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Feud.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 앞으로 우린 계속 원한이 쌓일 테니까 나중에 한꺼번에 청산하자고. 그래야 더 편할 걸? 10년 후가 될지, 20년 후가 될지…. 걱정 마, 난 절대 잊지 않아. 그러니까 그전까지 무사해야 돼
|vo_06_02_rm         = Apeuro urin gyesok wonhan'i ssail tenikka najung'e hankkeobeon'e cheongsanhajago. Geuraeya deo pyeonhal geol? Sipnyeon huga doelji, isipnyeon huga doelji.... Geokjeong ma, nan jeoldae itji ana. Geureonikka geujeonkkaji musahaeya dwae
|vo_06_02_tl         = We will keep build grudges, so let's settle all of them at once later. That would be more convenient, you know? Whether it will be 10 years later, or 20 years later... Don't worry, I never forget. So you have to be safe until then.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the Vision
|vo_07_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 「죄인의 후예」. 이 호칭은 정말 별로야. 나만의 방식으로 복수를 해나가야만 이 호칭에서 완전히 벗어날 수 있어. 복수를 하려면 힘이 필요해. 그러니 「신의 눈」을 얻은 건 어쩌면 당연한 일이겠지
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Joein-ui Huye". I hoching'eun jeongmal byeolloya. Naman-ui bangsigeuro boksureul haenagayaman i hoching'eseo wanjeonhi beoseonal su isseo. Boksureul haryeomyeon himi piryohae. Geureoni "Sin-ui Nun"eul eodeun geon eojjeomyeon dangyeonhan irigetji
|vo_07_01_tl         = "Descendant of a Sinner". I really dislike this title. I can completely escape from this title only if I avenge with my own way. To avenge, I need power. So maybe it is natural to earn a "Vision".

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기・골피리
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share: Bone Whistle
|vo_07_02_friendship    = 4
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Bone Whistle.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 내 골피리는 다양한 소리로 적을 미혹시킬 수 있어. 아주 유용하지. 이걸로 항상 파도 소리를 연주해서 「파도 기사」란 호칭을 얻게 된 거야. 근데 골피리가 리월에서 비롯됐다는 사실에 관심을 두는 사람은 아무도 없어. 몬드에 배척당한 죄인이 모두에게 잊혀진 리월 사람을 스승으로 모신 거에 대해서도… 신경 안 쓰고
|vo_07_02_rm         = Nae golpirineun dayanghan soriro jeogeul mihoksikil su isseo. Aju yuyonghaji. Igeollo hangsang pado sorireul yeonjuhaeseo "Pado Gisa"ran hoching'eul eotge doen geoya. Geunde golpiriga Riworeseo birotdwaetdaneun sasire gwansimeul duneun sarameun amudo eopsseo. Mondeue baecheokdanghan joeini moduege ichyeojin Riwol sarameul seuseung'euro mosin geoe daehaeseodo... sin'gyeong an sseugo
|vo_07_02_tl         = My bone pipe can entice the enemy with different sounds. Very useful. I always performed the sound of waves with it that I got the title of "Wave Knight". But there is no one who is interested in the fact that bone pipes came from Liyue. They also don't care about... a sinner excluded by Mondstadt taking a forgotten Liyuean as a teacher.

|vo_07_03_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기・술
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Something To Share: Wine-Tasting
|vo_07_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Wine-Tasting.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 일반적으로 오래 묵은 민들레주는 은잔에 마셔야 해. 12분 동안 디캔팅을 한 뒤에 얼음을 넣는데, 술은 얼음이 6할 정도 잠기게 넣는 게 좋아. 근데 너무 복잡하잖아, 난 별로야
|vo_07_03_rm         = Ilbanjeogeuro orae mugeun mindeullejuneun eunjane masyeoya hae. Sibibun dong'an dikaenting'eul han dwie eoreumeul neotneunde, sureun eoreumi yukhal jeongdo jamgige neotneun ge joa. Geunde neomu bokjaphajana, nan byeolloya
|vo_07_03_tl         = Normally, old Dandelion Wine should be drank in a silver cup. After decanting for twelve minutes, you put ice in, and it is good to pour the alcohol until sixty percent of the ice sinks. But it's too complicated, I don't like it.

|vo_07_04_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = 난 서리꽃이 좋아. 근데 왜 이렇게 희귀한 건지. 서리꽃 가루는 골피리 소리를 더 맑게 만드는 효과가 있어
|vo_07_04_rm         = Nan seorikkochi joa. Geunde wae ireoke huigwihan geonji. Seorikkot garuneun golpiri sorireul deo malkke mandeuneun hyogwaga isseo
|vo_07_04_tl         = I like Mist Flower Corolla. But why must it be so rare. Mist Flower Corolla powder has an effect to make bone pipes sound more clearer.

|vo_08_01_title      = 엠버에 대해…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Amber]]
|vo_08_01_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Amber.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 엠버는 늘 제멋대로야. 내가 기사단에 들어온 첫날, 숙소를 청소해주고 여기저기 구경시켜준 다음, 귀찮은 일들까지 다 처리해주더라고. 날 꼭 동생 취급하는 것 같았다니까! 그게 말이 돼?! 이 원한은 절대 잊지 않겠어!
|vo_08_01_rm         = Embeoneun neul jemotdaeroya. Naega gisadane deureo'on cheotnal, suksoreul cheongsohaejugo yeogijeogi gugyeongsikyeojun daeum, gwichaneun ildeulkkaji da cheorihaejudeorago. Nal kkok dongsaeng chwigeuphaneun geot gatatdanikka! Geuge mari dwae?! I wonhaneun jeoldae itji ankesseo!
|vo_08_01_tl         = Amber always does what she wants. At the first day I started working at the Knights, she cleaned my room, took me around, and took care of all troublesome work. As if I was her little sister! Does this make sense?! I'll never forget this resentment!

|vo_08_02_title      = 진에 대해…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Jean]]
|vo_08_02_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 단장 대행? 그쪽 가문과 내 가문은 숙적이야. 근데 개인적으론 공사가 분명한 분이지. 내 실력을 알아보고 날 기사단에 가입시켰지. 이런저런 기회도 많이 줬고. 그래서 복수할 때 좀 봐줄까 해
|vo_08_02_rm         = Danjang daehaeng? Geujjok gamungwa nae gamuneun sukjeogiya. Geunde gaeinjeogeuron gongsaga bunmyeonghan buniji. Nae sillyeogeul arabogo nal gisadane gaipsikyeotji. Ireonjeoreon gihoedo mani jwotgo. Geuraeseo boksuhal ttae jom bwajulkka hae
|vo_08_02_tl         = Acting Grandmaster? Her Clan and my Clan are sworn enemies. But she is a person who keeps public and private matters clear. She enlisted me in the Knights after finding out my abilities. Gave me many opportunities, too. So I might as well as tolerate her while avenging.

|vo_08_03_title      = 리사에 대해…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 아, 정말 성가신 여자야. 머릿속에 수천 권의 책이 들어 있을걸? 아니, 수만 권일지도. 그녀는 로렌스 가문의 흑역사를 줄줄이 꿰고 있고 사건의 날짜까지 정확히 기억해. 그녀라면 내가 찾고 있는 사람의 행방을 추적할 수 있겠지만, 나도 자존심이 있지
|vo_08_03_rm         = A, jeongmal seonggasin yeojaya. Meoritsoge sucheon gwonui chagi deureo isseulgeol? Ani, suman gwoniljido. Geunyeoneun Rorenseu Gamun-ui heukyeoksareul juljuri kkwego itgo sageonui naljjakkaji jeonghwakhi gieokhae. Geunyeoramyeon naega chatgo itneun saramui haengbang'eul chujeokhal su itgetjiman, nado jajonsimi itji
|vo_08_03_tl         = Ah, what a bothersome woman. She must have thousands of books in her head, huh? No, it could be tens of thousands of books. She knows every embarrassing past of the Lawrence Clan, and remebers each and every date. She could track who I am trying to find, but I have my pride, too.

|vo_08_04_title      = 바바라에 대해…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Barbara]]
|vo_08_04_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Barbara.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 대체 무슨 비결이 있길래 사람들이 그녀를 그렇게 좋아할까? 나도 좀 배울 수 있으면… 아냐, 됐어. 「아이돌」이랑 「죄인의 후예」는 누가 봐도 안 어울리잖아
|vo_08_04_rm         = Daeche museun bigyeori itgillae saramdeuri geunyeoreul geureotge joahalkka? Nado jom baeul su isseumyeon... Anya, dwaesseo. "Aidol"irang "Joein-ui Huye"neun nuga bwado an eoullijana
|vo_08_04_tl         = What secret is there that people like her so much? If I could learn a bit... No, it's fine. An "Idol" and a "Descendant of a Sinner" obviously do not go well.

|vo_08_05_title      = 바르카에 대해…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_05_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 대단장 말인가? 그는 성격이 시원시원하고 사소한 일이나 소문 따위를 신경 쓰지 않아. 전반적으로 좋은 사람이지. 그와의 대결에서 비긴 적이 있는데, 그 여유로운 표정과 산만한 태도는 분명 일부러 봐준 게 틀림없어! 이런 모욕을 주다니! 이 원한, 절대 잊지 않겠어!
|vo_08_05_rm         = Daedanjang maringa? Geuneun seonggyeogk siwonsiwonhago sasohan irina somun ttawireul sin'gyeong sseuji ana. Jeonbanjeogeuro joeun saramiji. Geuwa-ui daegyeoreseo bigin jeogi itneunde, geu yeoyuroun pyojeonggwa sanmanhan taedoneun bunmyeong ilbureo bwajun ge teullimeopsseo! Ireon moyogeul judani! I wonhan, jeoldae itji ankesseo!
|vo_08_05_tl         = You mean the Grandmaster? He has a straightfoward personality, and doesn't care about trivial matters or rumors. A good person overall. I have tied with a duel against him once, but it was so clear that he deliberately let it slide with that relaxed face and unfocused attitude! Offering an insult like this! I'll never forget this resentment!

|vo_08_06_title      = 벤티에 대해…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Venti]]
|vo_08_06_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Venti.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 그 음유시인은 로렌스 가문의 이야기를 경쾌한 노래로 만들어서 듣도 보도 못한 말투로 막 조롱하더라니까. 나까지 웃음이 터졌지 뭐야…. 이 원한, 기억해두겠어
|vo_08_06_rm         = Geu eumyusi'ineun Rorenseu Gamun-ui iyagireul gyeongkwaehan noraero mandeureoseo deutdo bodo mothan malturo mak joronghadeoranikka. Nakkaji useumi teojyeotji mwoya.... I wonhan, gieokhaedugesseo
|vo_08_06_tl         = That bard made the story of the Lawrence Clan to a cheerful song and ridiculed with a tone I have never heard of. Even I cracked a smile at that... I'll remember this resentment.

|vo_08_07_title      = 레이저에 대해…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Razor]]
|vo_08_07_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Razor.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 예절을 지키거나 다른 사람의 시선을 신경 쓸 필요도 없고, 짊어져야 할 가문의 책임도 없으니…. 그의 삶은 꽤나 편하겠어
|vo_08_07_rm         = Yejeoreul jikigeona dareun saramui siseoneul sin'gyeong sseul piryodo eopgo, jilmeojeoya jal gamunui chaegimdo eopsseumi.... Geu-ui salmeun kkwaena pyeonhagesseo
|vo_08_07_tl         = No need to be courteous or to think of others' gazes, and no responsibility for a Clan... His life must be quite convenient.

|vo_08_08_title      = 설탕에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Sucrose]]
|vo_08_08_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sucrose.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 그 연금술사? 심연 교단 영지에 잠입할 때 유용할 거라면서 어떤 장치를 준 적이 있어. 근데 그게 큰 소리를 내며 터져버리는 바람에 츄츄 폭도 30마리한테 둘러싸였지…. 나중에 따지러 갔더니 너무 당황하면서 미안해하기에 결국 별말 못했어. 벽에 실패 기록 같은 것도 붙어 있더라고…. 다친 덴 없었지만 먼지를 뒤집어써서 좀 민망했을 뿐이야
|vo_08_08_rm         = Geu yeon'geumsulsa? Simyeon gyodan yeongjie jamipal ttae yuyonghal georamyeonseo eotteon jangchireul jun jeogi isseo. Geunde geuge keun sorireul naemyeo teojyeobeorineun barame chyuchyu pokdo samsipmarihante dulleossayeotji.... Najung'e ttajireo gatdeoji neomu danghwanghamyeonseo mianhaehagillae gyeolguk byeolmal mothaesseo. Byeoge silpae girok gateun geotdo buteo itdeorago.... Dachin den eopsseotjiman meonjireul dwijibeosseoseo jom minmanghaesseul ppuniya
|vo_08_08_tl         = That Alchemist? She gave me a device, telling me it would be useful while infiltrating in the Abyss Order's territory. But since it exploded with a big sound, I got surrounded by thirty Mitachurls... When I went to nitpick on her later, she was so embarrassed and said sorry, so I couldn't say anything. There were failure records on her wall too... I wasn't hurt, just a bit ashamed because I got dirt on me.

|vo_08_09_title      = 다이루크에 대해…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Diluc]]
|vo_08_09_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 내가 기사단의 몇몇 사람이랑 안 맞는 것처럼, 그도 기사단을 싫어하니까 따져보면 우린 같은 편이야. 근데 사람을 거들떠보지도 않는 그의 태도는 단장 대행보다도 성가실 것 같아서 별로 친하게 지내고 싶진 않아
|vo_08_09_rm         = Naega Gisadan-ui myeotmyeot saramirang an matneun geotcheoreom, geudo Gisadaneul sireohanikka ttajyeobomyeon urin gateun pyeoniya. Geunde sarameul geodeultteobojido anneun geu-ui taedoneun danjang daehaengbodado seonggasil geot gataseo byeollo chinhage jinaego sipjin ana
|vo_08_09_tl         = As I do not mingle well with a few people in the Knights, he hates the Knights as well, which means we are in the same side. But his attitude of not giving a look to others must be more bothersome than the Acting Grandmaster, so I don't want to be friendly with him.

|vo_08_10_title      = 디오나에 대해…
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Diona]]
|vo_08_10_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diona.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 정말 신기한 바텐더야. 나랑 좀 잘 통하는 것 같아. 그녀는 몬드 주류업을 망치기 위해 술집에서 일하고, 난 기사단에 복수하기 위해 기사가 됐잖아. 세상에 이런 우연이
|vo_08_10_rm         = Jeongmal sin'gihan batendeoya. Narang jom jal tonghaneun geot gata. Geunyeoneun Mondeu juryueobeul mangchigi wihae suljibeseo ilhago, nan gisadane boksuhagi wihae gisaga dwaetjana. Sesang'e ireon uyeoni
|vo_08_10_tl         = What an amazing bartender. I think she goes with me well. She works at the bar to destroy Mondstadt's wine industry, and I became a Knight to avenge to the Knights. What a coincidence.

|vo_08_11_title      = 연비에 대해・만남…
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Yanfei]]: Encounter
|vo_08_11_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yanfei - Encounter.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 말하자면 길어…. 예전에 심연 교단의 위험 물품을 추적할 때 우연히 연비를 구해줬거든. 그 당시 교단의 위험 물품은 일반 화물로 위장된 채로 돈만 항구에서 리월항으로 옮겨가던 중이었어. 마침 화물선의 고문이었던 연비는 뭔가 잘못됐다는 걸 알아채고 멋대로 조사를 진행하다가 화를 자초한 거지. 우리가 조금이라도 늦게 도착했다면 큰일 날 뻔했어
|vo_08_11_rm         = Malhajamyeon gireo.... Yejone Simyeon Gyodan-ui wiheom mulpumeul chujeokhal ttae uyeonhi geunyeoreul guhaetgeodeun. Geu dangsi gyodan-ui wiheom mulpumeun ilban hwamullo wijangdoen chaero Hyeongbuhang'eseo Riwol-hangeuro omgyeogadeon jung'ieosseo. Machim hwamulson-ui gomunieotdeon geunyeoneun mwonga jalmotdwaetdaneun geol arachaego meotdaero josareul jinhaenghadaga hwareul jachohan geoji. Uriga jogeumirado meutge dochakhaetdamyeon keunil nal ppeonhaesseo
|vo_08_11_tl         = It's a long story... A long time ago, when I was tracking the hazard goods of the Abyss Order, I saved her by chance. At that time, the hazard goods of the Order were disguised as normal cargo and was being shipped from Dornman Port to Liyue Harbor. The adviser of the cargo ship, Yanfei, realized something was wrong just in time and inquired into it by herself, which brought misfortune upon herself. If we arrived just a bit late, something bad might have happened.

|vo_08_12_title      = 연비에 대해・관점…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About Yanfei: Assessment
|vo_08_12_friendship    = 4
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yanfei - Assessment.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = 그 뒤로도 우린 서로 연락하면서 지내. 똑똑하고 영리한 성격이 꽤 맘에 들더라고. 그녀는 규칙을 잘 지키지만, 융통성도 있는 편이야. 기사단의 몇몇 사람들이 좀 배웠으면 좋겠어. 게다가 연비의 실력이라면 그 사람을 찾아줄 수 있을 거야. 나한테 신세 진 걸 갚는 셈인 거지
|vo_08_12_rm         = Geu dwirodo urin seoro yeonrakhamyeonseo jinae. Ttokttokhago yeongrihan seonggyeogi kkwae mame deuldeorago. Geunyeoneun gyuchigeul jal jikijiman, yungtongseongdo itneun pyeoniya. Gisadan-ui myeotmyeot saramdeuri jom baewosseumyeon jokesseo. Gedaga Yeonbi-ui sillyeogiramyeon geu sarameul chajajul su isseul geoya. Nahante sinse jin geol gapneun semiji
|vo_08_12_tl         = After that occasion, we still keep in touch. I pretty much like her smart personality. She keeps the rules, but also has flexibility. I want some people of the Knights to learn from her. Also, with Yanfei's abilities, she could find that person. Repaying what I have done to her.

|vo_08_13_title      = 미카에 대해・소통
|vo_08_13_subtitle   = About [[Mika]]: Communication
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mika - Communication.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx         = 미카가 유격대에 처음 왔을 땐 그전에 있던 몇몇 사람들처럼 얼마 못 버티고 나갈 줄 알았어. 그런데 묵묵히 버티면서 임무를 아주 훌륭하게 완수했지. 게다가 자진해서 심부름 같은 잡일까지 도맡아서 하고 나와 다른 사람들이 소통하는 것도 도와줬어. 흥, 자꾸 날 챙겨주려 하다니… 대체 누굴 보고 배운 건지
|vo_08_13_rm         = Mika-ga yugyeokdae'e cheoeum wasseul ttaen geujeone itdeon myeotmyeot saramdeulcheoreom eolma mot beotigo nagal jul arasseo. Geureonde mukmukhi beotimyeonseo immureul aju hullyunghage wansuhaetji. Gedaga jajinhaeseo simbureum gateun jabilkkaji domataseo hago nawa dareun saramdeuri sotonghaneun geotdo dowajwosseo. Heung, jakku nal chaenggyeojuryeo hadani... daeche nugul bogo baeun geonji
|vo_08_13_tl         = When Mika came to the Reconnaissance Company first, I thought he would leave quickly like some of the others who were there. But he held out silently and finished his tasks excellently. Also, he does chores by himself and helped me communicate with others. Hmph, trying to care for me... where did he learn it.

|vo_08_14_title      = 미카에 대해・복귀
|vo_08_14_subtitle   = About Mika: Returning
|vo_08_14_friendship = 4
|vo_08_14_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mika - Returning.ogg
|vo_08_14_tx         = 미카가 원정대에서 돌아왔어. 성격은 그대론데 전보다 많이 강해졌더라고. 대단장이 단원들 훈련을 소홀히 하지 않은 모양이야. 음? 미카 본인은 모르는 것 같다고? 그야 워낙 둔하니까… 아니면 겸손하다고 하는 게 맞나? 내 대원이니, 그런 건 딱 봐도 알 수 있거든
|vo_08_14_rm         = 
|vo_08_14_tl         = 

|vo_09_01_title      = 유라에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 죄인의 일생이 궁금할 게 뭐 있어? 어차피 무슨 말이나 행동을 해도 잠재적인 위험인물로 볼 건데. 그래도 지금은 좀 나은 편이야. 기사단에 들어오기 전엔 디어 헌터랑 몬드 잡화점 모두 날 손님으로 안 받아줬어. 야외에서 사냥하고 불을 피워 끼니를 해결했다고
|vo_09_01_rm         = Joein-ui ilsaeng'i gunggeumhal ge mwo isseo? Eochapi museun marina haengdong'eul haedo jamjaejeogin wiheominmullo bol geonde. Geuraedo jigeumeun jom naeun pyeoniya. Gisadane deureo'ogi jeonen Dieo Heonteorang Mondeu Japhwajeom modu nal sonnimeuro an badajwosseo. Yaoe'eseo sanyanghago bureul piwo kkinireul hagyeolhaetdago
|vo_09_01_tl         = What is there to be curious over a sinner's life? I'll be seen as a potential threat whatever I say or do. But it got a little better now. Before I entered the Knights, Good Hunter and Mondstadt General Goods all did not accept me as a customer. I had to eat by hunting and making a fire outside.

|vo_09_02_title      = 유라에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_friendship    = 3
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 나한테 굽신거리고 언행을 조심하면 용서받을 수 있을지도 모른다고 말했던 자들이 있어. 하지만 그렇게 말할 수 있는 건 그들이 진짜 「죄인」이 아니기 때문이지. 「죄인」은 쉽게 용서받을 수 없어. 그러니 차라리 시원하게 복수하고 정정당당하게 싸우는 게 나아. 나한테 이기면 시키는 대로 하겠지만, 나한테 지면 내 요구를 들어주는 거야. 예를 들어… 음, 적어도 나한테 물건은 팔아줘야지?
|vo_09_02_rm         = Nahante gupsingeorigo eonhaeng'eul josimhamyeon yongseobadeul su isseuljido moreundago malhaetdeon jadeuri isseo. Hajiman geureoke malhal su itneun geon geudeuri jinjja "Joein"i anigi ttaemuniji. "Joein"eun swipge yongseobadeul su eopsseo. Geureoni charari siwonhage boksuhgao jeongjeongdangdanghage ssauneun ge na'a. Nahante igimyeon sikineun daero hagetjiman, nahante jimyeon nae yogureul deureojuneun geoya. Yereul deureo... Eum, jeogeodo nahante mulgeoneun parajwoyaji?
|vo_09_02_tl         = There are people who said that if one acts subserviently to me and be careful with their words, they might be forgiven. But the reason they can say that is because they are not real "Sinners". A "Sinner" cannot be forgiven easily. So it is better to just avenge and fight fair and square. If they defeat me, I'll do whatever they want, but if they lose to me, they have to hear my request. For example... Hmm, at least they have to sell goods to me, right?

|vo_09_03_title      = 유라에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_friendship    = 4
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 페보니우스 기사단은 생각보다 괜찮은 곳이더라고. 적어도 사람을 볼 때 「신분」보단 「재능」을 중시하니까. 예전에 기사단 정예들과 겨뤘을 때 실력으로 그들을 제압했더니 입단 초청을 받았어. 기사단 내부에서 일하면 복수하기도 편하고 살기도 훨씬 편해지는데 마다할 이유가 없잖아?
|vo_09_03_rm         = Peboniuseu Gisadaneun saenggakboda gwaenchaneun gosideorago. Jeogeodo sarameul bol ttae "Sinbun"bodan "Jaeneung"eul jungsihanikka. Yejone gisadan jeong'yedeulgwa gyeorwosseul ttae sillyeogeuro geudeureul jeaphaetdeoni ipdan chocheong'eul badasseo. Gisadan naebueseo ilhamyeon boksuhagido pyeonhago salgido hwolssin pyeonhaejineunde madahal iyuga eopjana?
|vo_09_03_tl         = The Knights of Favonius is a better place than expected. At least they value "Skills" more than a person's "Class" while valuing them. Some time ago, when I fought with the Knights' elites, I got a join invitation by dominating them. Working inside the Knights makes avenging and living easier, is there a reason to refuse?

|vo_09_04_title      = 유라에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_friendship    = 5
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 로렌스 가문이 오명을 뒤집어쓴 건 타락한 이후야. 그전에는 아주 명예로운 가문이었지. 근데 아쉽게도 그때의 역사는 전부 잊혀졌어. 대단장은 내가 기사로서 잘하고 있다면서 과거 로렌스 영광을 되찾은 건 아니지만, 최소한 단편적인 관점을 깨트렸다고 했어. 나도 같은 생각이야
|vo_09_04_rm         = Rorenseu Gamuni omyeong'eul dwijibeosseun geon tarakhan ihuya. Geujeoneun aju myeong'yeroun gamunieotji. Geunde aswipgedo geuttae-ui yeoksaneun jeonbu ichyeojyeosseo. Daedanjang'eun naega gisaroseo jalhago itdamyeonseo gwageo Rorenseu yeonggwang'eul doechajeun geon anijiman, choesohan danpyeonjeogin gwanjeomeul kkaeteuryeotdago haesseo. Nado gateun saenggagiya
|vo_09_04_tl         = It is after the Lawrence Clan's corruption that we brought dishonor. Before that, we were a very honorable Clan. But it is such a shame that the history then is all forgotten. The Grandmaster said that I'm doing well as a Knight, and even though the glory of the old Lawrence did not recover, at least I broke a fragmentary notion. I have the same thought, too.

|vo_09_05_title      = 유라에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_friendship    = 6
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 만약 가문 사람들이 잘못을 깨우치지 못하고 심지어 몬드를 계속 해롭게 한다면, 난 그들과 로렌스라는 성을 직접 없애버리겠지…. 아마 이게 내가 유일하게 이행하고 싶은 「가문의 책임」이겠지. 그리고 성을 다른 걸로 바꾸지 뭐. 네가 지어줘도 되고!
|vo_09_05_rm         = Manyak gamun saramdeuri jalmoseul kkaeuchiji mothago simjieo Mondeureul gyesok haeropge handamyeon, nan geudeulgwa Rorenseuraneun seong'eul jikjeop eopssaebeorigetji.... Ama ige nega yuilhage ihaenghago sipeun "Gamun-ui Chaegim"igetji. Geurigo seong'eul dareun geollo bakkuji mwo. Nega jieojwodo doego!
|vo_09_05_tl         = If the people in our Clan do not realize their flaws and keep harming Mondstadt, I'll remove them and the last name Lawrence by myself... Maybe this is the only "Responsibility of the Clan" I want to carry out. And I'll change my last name to something else. You can name it!

|vo_10_01_title      = 유라의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 시원한 건 다 좋아. 차가운 술과 음료를 맘껏 마신 뒤 협곡 입구에 앉아 광풍을 느끼거나, 드래곤 스파인 밑의 호수에 뛰어들어 목욕하는 것들 말이야. 호숫가에서 있으면 내가 얼음물 속으로 끌어당길지도 몰라~
|vo_10_01_rm         = Siwonhan geon da joa. Chagaun sulgwa eumryoreul mamkkeot masin dwi hyeopgok ipgue anja gwangpung'eul neukkigeona, Deuraegon Supain mitui hosue ttwieodeureo mogyokhaneun geotdeul mariya. Hosutgaeseo isseumyeon naega eoreummul sogeureo kkeureodanggiljido molla~
|vo_10_01_tl         = I like everything cool. Drinking cold alcohol and beverages as much as I want and feeling the gale while sitting at the entrance of the canyon, or jumping in the lake below Dragonspine and taking a bath. If you stay near the lake, I might pull you in the ice water~

|vo_10_02_title      = 유라의 고민…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 가끔 술집에 사람이 많아서 자리가 없을 때 합석하라고 하는데, 내가 로렌스 가문 사람이라는 걸 알고는 허세 부리거나 도발하고 은근슬쩍 딴지를 거는 놈들이 하나둘씩 나타난다니까. 이봐, 조용히 술 좀 마시자고
|vo_10_02_rm         = Gakkeum suljibe sarami manaseo jariga eopsseul ttae hapseokharago haneunde, naega Rorenseu gamun saramiraneun geol algoneun heose burigeona dobalhago eungeunseuljjeok ttajireul geoneun nomdeuri hanadulssik natanandanikka. Ibwa, joyonghi sul jom masijago
|vo_10_02_tl         = Sometimes there are too many people in the bar that people are made to sit together when there are no spare seats, but there are a few people who appear boasting, provoking, or picking on me knowing I'm a person from the Lawrence Clan. Hey, let me drink in peace.

|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 난 간식 만드는 걸 좋아해. 간식이라고 꼭 달달한 디저트는 아니야. 차갑게 만든 토마토 고기 오믈렛은 아이스 라즈베리 허브주랑 아주 잘 어울려. 중요한 건 내가 만든 간식을 먹고 행복해하는 사람이 있다는 거지
|vo_10_03_rm         = Nan gansik mandeuneun geol joahae. Gansigirago kkok daldalhan dijeoteuneun aniya. Chagapge mandeun tomato gogi omeulleseun aiseu raseuberi heobeujurang aju jal eoullyeo. Jung'yohan geon naega mandeun gansigeul meokgo haengbokhaehaneun sarami itdaneun geoji
|vo_10_03_tl         = I like making snacks. Snacks doesn't always mean sweet dessert. Cold tomato meat omelet go well with Iced Raspberry Herb Punch. The important thing is that there is someone who is happy by eating my snacks.

|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 걸쭉한 수프는 진짜 내 취향이 아니야. 식감이 텁텁하고 포만감이 심해서 운동과 전투에 방해되거든. 게다가 싸가지고 다니기도 불편하고. 그야말로 내 천적이지
|vo_10_04_rm         = Geoljjukhan supeuneun jinjja nae chwihyang'i aniya. Sikgami teopteophago pomangami simhaeseo undonggwa jeontue banghaedoegeodeun. Gedaga ssagajigo danigido bulpyeonhago Geuyamallo nae cheonjogiji
|vo_10_04_tl         = Thick soup is really not my type. It has a soupy texture, and makes me feel extremely full that it disturbs exercising and fighting. Also, it is inconvenient to take out. It really is my natural enemy.

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 음? 나한테 도전하는 거야? 받아들이지
|vo_11_01_rm         = Eum? Nahante dojeonhanenun geoya? Badadeuriji
|vo_11_01_tl         = Hmm? Are you challenging me? I accept.

|vo_11_02_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 그럭저럭 먹을 만 해… 너도 먹어보지 그래?
|vo_11_02_rm         = Geurokjeoreok meogeul man hae... Neodo meogeoboji geurae?
|vo_11_02_tl         = It's edible... Why don't you eat it, too?

|vo_11_03_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 이봐 너, 나한테 복수하는 거야?
|vo_11_03_rm         = Ibwa neo, nahante boksuhaneun geoya?
|vo_11_03_tl         = Hey, are you avenging to me?

|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 오늘은 기념할 만한 날이네? 하지만 넌 나이만 성장한 게 아니야. 특제 골피리를 줄 테니까 나한테 연주하는 법을 배워 봐. 내가 너한테 복수하게 될 그 날, 이 골피리로 날 방해하고 시간을 끌면서 발악해. 그럼 더 재밌겠지
|vo_12_01_rm         = Oneureun ginyeomhal manhan narine? Hajiman neon naiman seongjanghan ge aniya. Teukje golpirireul jul tenikka nahante yeonjuhaneun beobeul baewo bwa. Naega neohante boksuhage doel geu nal, i golpiriro nal banghaehago siganeul kkeulmyeonseo barakhae. Geureom deo jaemitgetji
|vo_12_01_tl         = Today is a memorable day, huh? But you didn't only age. I'll give you a specially made bone pipe, so learn from me how to play it. The day I will avenge to you, disturb me with this bone pipe and struggle while buying time. Then it would be more entertaining.

|vo_13_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 전투 기술이 많이 늘었어, 근데 아직 좋아하긴 일러. 기사단엔 부지런한 놈들이 많으니까. 그들을 물리치고 복수를 마치려면, 그들의 실력을 초월해야 돼
|vo_13_01_rm         = Jeontu gisuri mani neureosseo, geunde ajik joahagin illeo. Gisadanen bujireonhan nomdeuri maneunikka. Geudeureul mullichigo boksureul machiryeomyeon, geudeurui sillyeogeul chowolhaeya dwae
|vo_13_01_tl         = My combat skills really got better, but it's too early too be happy about it. There are many diligent guys in the Knights. To defeat them and finish my revenge, I must transcend their abilities.

|vo_13_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = 좋아. 지금의 내 실력이면 단장 대행과 겨뤄도 문제없겠어!
|vo_13_02_rm         = Joa. Jigeumui nae sillyeogimyeon danjang daehaenggwa gyeorwodo munje'eopgesseo!
|vo_13_02_tl         = Good. With my current abilities, there would be no problem if I fought with the Acting Grandmaster!

|vo_13_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 이상하네…? 너와 동행할 땐 힘이 특히 더 빨리 강해지는 것 같아. 너와 원수가 된 건 좋은 선택이었던 것 같아. 네 옆에 딱 달라붙어서 놓아주지 말아야겠어
|vo_13_03_rm         = Isanghane...? Neowa donghaenghal ttaen himi teukhi deo ppalli ganghaejineun geot gata. Neowa wonsuga doen geon joeun seontaegieotdeon geot gata. Ne yeope ttak dallabuteoseo noajuji marayagesseo
|vo_13_03_tl         = Weird...? When I accompany you, I feel like I'm getting stronger fastly. Being enemies with you was a good choice. I should not let you go by sticking by your side.

|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 좋아! 이제 이 견고한 얼음의 힘을 완전히 지배했어. 단장 대행이 아니라 대단장조차도 날 못 막을 걸! 시간이 없어. 이제 작전을 짜고 총공격을 할 수 있겠군. 페보니우스 기사단 다음은 바로 너니까 도망칠 생각 말고 얌전히 내 옆에서 지켜보기나 하라고
|vo_13_04_rm         = Joa! Ije i gyeon'gohan eoreumui himeul wanjeonhi jibaehaesseo. Danjang daehaeng'i anira daedanjangjochado nal mot mageul geol! Sigani eopsseo. Ije jakjeoneul jjago chonggonggyeogeul hal so itgetgun. Peboniuseu Gisadan daeumeun baro neonikka domangchil saenggak malgo yamjeonhi nae yeopeseo jikyeobogina harago
|vo_13_04_tl         = Good! Now I have completely controlled the power of solice ice. Not only the Acting Grandmaster but the Grandmaster won't be able to stop me! There is no time. I can make strategies and start an all-out attack now. Next to the Knights of Favonius is you, so don't think of running away and watch beside me.
}}
